Bibliographic Ghosts: Cambridge UK, Corpus Christi College 301, f. 141v: this Walter of Henley text does not include these English lines; Oxford, Bodleian Library Selden Supra 74 (SC 3462).
_description: An English proverb — two short couplets in Le Dite de Hoseboundrie by Walter de Henley

BodDou98.Transcription: On yer other thowrong wile on hond gon

BodRawB471.Transcription:
On yer and other wrong wol and hond goand euere atte ende
                    wrong wol wende

OxfMert321.Transcription:
On yer other twoWrong wol an honde goand euere atte þe
                    endewrong wol wende

CULEe11.Transcription:
On ȝeer oþer toWroge wylle on honde goAnt euere aten
                    hendewrong wile wende
